## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                 | Type      |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `collapsed` | `collapsed` | In modal mode, it used to control if the drawers is opened. | `boolean` |
| `theme`     | `theme`     | The color theme.                                            | `string`  |


## Methods

### `toggle() => void`

Toggle opened state of the modal drawer.

#### Returns

Type: `void`
